summary: 2k texture files for ghosus quiver version 2
descriptionHtml:
Some people asked me, if I will make a retexture for Ghosus quiver. Here it is - made a 2k and 1k version fitting to my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44333/?]Auriels Bow[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51148/?]shield[/url] textures.

Version 2.0 of the mod includes a corrected mesh for the bloodcursed quiver. The arrows have now the correct texture paths and the bright shine is removed. Thanks to Spatosity who gave me the right tip!

[u][size=3]Installation:[/size][/u]
[list=1][*][size=2]Download and install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51822/?]Ghosu - Auriels Quiver Replacer version 2[/url] Chose wheather you need the PLA version.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Download my textures, the mesh and install them and overwrite everything when asked.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]If you have chosen the PLA version, download the compatible mesh.
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]If you have also my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58118/?]Sunhallowed and Bloodcursed Arrow - HD Retexture[/url] installed, download also the compatible mesh.
[/size][/*]
[/list]

[size=3]Why do you need version 2 ?[/size]
Version 2 comes with a modified texture path and doesn't use the original auriels bow and shield textures. So you can use any auriels bow and shield retexture without having a weird looking quiver.


Looks great with amidianborns cubemap from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37487]aMidianBorn Ebony[/url] golden version retexture.


Edited File: aurielsarrowblood.nif
- corrected the emessive color in the BSLightingShaderProperty to black
- corrected texture path to the correct files of the bloodcursed textures
- Sunhallowed and Bloodcursed Arrow - HD Retexture compatible version: added additional aurielsarrow_blood.dds path

[size=3]Known Bug:[/size]
The quiver mesh has some clipping issues with the arrows inside the quiver.


Thanks to Ghosu for his great mods! Please leave an endorsment on the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51822/?]original mod page[/url].
author: Alana12
